query:
SELECT
                u.id,
                u.display_name,
                u.profile_picture,
                u.street_credits,
                u.description,
                u.friends_count,
                u.role
                FROM app_user u
                INNER JOIN user_relationship ur ON
                    (ur.user_a_id = u.id AND ur.user_b_id = $1 AND ur.state = 'A_INVITED') OR
                    (ur.user_b_id = u.id AND ur.user_a_id = $1 AND ur.state = 'B_INVITED')
